meanings.definition: A group of Christian theologians who believed that Jesus was of a similar substance to God the Father.
meanings.sent1: The homoiousians gathered to discuss their beliefs about Jesus.
meanings.sent2: Many homoiousians followed the teachings of their theologians.
meanings.sent3: The homoiousians jokingly referred to themselves as the 'Similarity Squad'.
meanings.sent4: In the theological debate, the homoiousians stood firm in their position.
meanings.sent5: The image of Jesus as similar to God was central to the homoiousians' beliefs.

meanings.definition: A follower or proponent of the homoiousian doctrine.
meanings.sent1: As a homoiousians, he strongly supported the doctrine he believed in.
meanings.sent2: The homoiousians were dedicated to spreading their doctrine.
meanings.sent3: The homoiousians organized a bake sale to raise funds for their cause.
meanings.sent4: She defended her beliefs like a true homoiousians.
meanings.sent5: The homoiousians' passion for their doctrine was evident in their actions.
